articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Russia: Giving F-16 fighter jets to Ukraine a ‘colossal risk’ - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Western nations ‘still adhering to escalation scenario’ that risks widening the Ukraine war in Europe, official says.
articles.content:
Western countries will be running colossal risks if they supply Ukraine with F-16 fighter jets, a Russian official says.
Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Alexander Grushko was responding to a questio… [+2573 chars]
